docs.title: Horilla Docs
docs.text: Selamat datang! Pilih topik di sidebar, atau mulai dari sini: - Arsitektur - System Administrator - Panduan User - RBAC & CRUD - Security - Integrasi AI - API

docs.title: Gambaran Umum
docs.text:
• Backend: Django (Python)
  • Database: PostgreSQL
  • API: Django REST Framework
  • Deployment: Docker / Docker Compose
  • Media: static & media folders

docs.title: Skalabilitas
docs.text:
• Modular apps (attendance, payroll, recruitment, dll)
  • Load balancing dengan Gunicorn + Nginx
  • DB clustering (PostgreSQL replication)
  • Caching (Redis/Memcached)
  • Task queue (Celery, opsional)

docs.title: Diagram
docs.text:
flowchart TD
    User -->|HTTP/HTTPS| Nginx --> Gunicorn --> DjangoApp --> PostgreSQL
    DjangoApp --> MediaStorage

docs.title: Instalasi
docs.text:
git clone https://github.com/horilla-opensource/horilla.git
cd horilla
cp .env.dist .env
pip install -r requirements.txt
python manage.py migrate
python manage.py runserver

docs.title: Fitur Utama
docs.text:
• Employee: kelola profil
  • Attendance: absensi biometrik/wajah
  • Leave: ajukan cuti
  • Payroll: lihat slip gaji
  • Helpdesk: buat tiket dukungan

docs.title: Panduan Singkat
docs.text:
• Edit profil → Menu Profile
  • Ajukan cuti → Leave → Apply Leave
  • Lihat slip gaji → Payroll → Payslip
  • Buat tiket → Helpdesk → New Ticket

docs.title: Contoh CRUD
docs.text: Modul Create Read Update Delete Employee HR/Admin Semua (self) HR/Admin/self Admin Leave Employee Manager/HR/self Manager/HR Admin Payroll HR Employee HR/Admin Admin

docs.title: Proteksi
docs.text:
• CSRF & XSS (built-in Django)
  • Password hashed (PBKDF2)
  • HTTPS wajib di production

docs.title: Potensi ke Depan
docs.text:
• Chatbot HR berbasis LLM
  • Prediksi turnover karyawan
  • Payroll & absensi analytics
